title: Fiora is still ruined after the Rework
body: I am wondering when you are going to fix the problem?

replies.body:
The people who downvote me are the ignorant majority...

They are the same type of person who thinks that surrendering helps you win the game.

They think...  The Fiora rework is great and that my main isn't ruined forever. 

Not too bright. 

That's ok.  I am here to enlighten you. 

I am still upset with the rework because I play Fiora more than anyone alive.

Bro, youve been making threads like this for what the past 2 years. 
Your obsession is actually a little disturbing. You really really really need to look into this. Not even being rude, I remember yoir posts from over a year ago even back then I felt something was off. 
But this is honestly just sad at this point.
You must not care about your champ.

I can accept an move on. You just ranmmble man. Half the shit you say sounds like a homless man who's drunk off his ass yelling about microchips in his skin. 

I looked up your op.gg. you have games that you are going 1-10, 0-9. 2-11. Like most of your games, even your games a fiora. If you are doing that consistently bad theres more to it than simply balance issues. 

Youve been doing this, these "drunken" rambles for like 2 years straight maybe even longer and countless times riot has told you to stop because you spam threads over and over. I hope you can vome out of this man. You got me truly worried
Ruined as in OP and a toxic kit to play against? Yeah, I agree.

At least she's hot now.

I'm not complaining.
Start playing champions that actually gets you out of Bronze 5, perhaps? Or at least build Fiora properly for once.

Dude this guy spams threads about fiora. Last years mods had to step in. In one of the threads he said that riot reworked fiora to intentionally take away HIS skill. He said that he was just so good at fiora that riot took that away from him personally. 
He also said that in most of his games he would very often get lvl1 penta kills and riot reworked her to punish him(again as if they had some personal vendetta against him specifically) for being so good.
